item.title: About Me
item.description: About Me Hello there! I’m Subhrajit, a second-year M.Tech student at the Indian Institute of Technology Gandhinagar, India. I love Computer Science, especially Computer Systems. Skills I’m learning skills related to Computer Systems, especially working with the kernel, architecture. Hobbies Traveling Experimenting with anything Feel free to explore my website to learn more about my work and projects.
